description:
Nice story, funny dialogs, melee or range fights, lots of spells, various posibilities how to fulfill missions and tasks, lots of enemies and in the middle of all of it stands fearless pinguin ;-)
I really like this game and I can only recommend it!
summary: Excellent RPG game with lot of fun

description: This game could sort of be called a "Gnu/Linux themed Fallout clone", except it adds some intersting elements, such as hacking computers and robots, that Fallout never had. In addition, the story is prety good, though you will need to be a free software junky to get all of it. My only complaints are that, first of all, a few more asets would have been nice (the same sprite is often re-used for several caracters), and secondly, that some of the jokes were a little off-color. Over all, though, good game, worth the download.
summary: Like fallout, but cleaner and much more philosophical

description:
It's mostly great, though there are a few things that could be better:
- There should be more characters(some human characters are re-used, same type of robots always have the same color, etc.)
- In some cases you have to go through the same process again and again for example at making addons, start > doesn't work, sudo start > works, but when you return there is no sudo option, you have to do start again which you already know doesn't work, then and only then you have the sudo start option. etc. (there are quite a few similar cases)
Spoiler alert: try invisibility rev 9, check sys. integrity rev 9, emerg. shudown rev 9, malformed packets rev 9, with 4x peltier on your armor, spend points on cooling improvement, and you'll not need anything else... ;)
Great Game, Loved It 5 Years Ago...
I CANT PLAY IT SUCKS 1 STAR
fun for the first few hours but not much content after that, needs more equiptment and enemies.
The game have references to my favorite RPG's, like Diablo and Fallout, and the jokes are funny. But I expected a better end, and the story is very short...
summary: The best Diablo copy, or something more

description: Fun, you are never overpowered (armorwise) and nicely balanced. BUT some NPCs swear >:P
summary: Fun, best RPG in the store..

description:
The game is amazing. However you have to read the dialogues to know where to get some improvements (Hacking, extracting parts, crafting addons, etc). The map and quest direction could be made easier.

Overall, it is an amazing rpg game with lots of levels, improvemnts, weapons, etc.

Note: There is a version 1.0rc2 at the moment that has two acts of the story instead of one act in version 0.16.1-5

I recommend playing it!
summary: Being open source and free have not deny creating such an amazing game

description: so cool I LOVE IT!

Ich liebe dieses Spiel und hasse es, dass es keine Fortsetzung gibt! 
Ganz ehrlich,das verstehe ich überhaupt nicht und hoffe,dass diese Renzension zu den Entwicklern vordringt.Das Spiel an sich ist Über-ober-Super genial(Grafiken,Texte)und deshalb hoffe ich,dass es irgendwann eine Fortsetzung gibt.
Das Spiel ist echt witzig, sollte man auf jeden Fall probieren!
